name: SEO for Figma
description:
With SEO for Figma it is possible to quickly check if a page within your website design in Figma meets general SEO guidelines where most mistakes are made. You select your frame, title, first paragraph and keyword and get results back with helpful feedback to improve your design in terms of SEO.


And that's not all. To help web designers with their biggest problem, coming up with quality content, a function has been devised for that as well. With the help of artificial intelligence, original content can be generated with a focus on SEO. Think of titles, paragraphs and meta texts. No more lorem ipsum! ðŸŽ‰


Key features:

  • Check your designs on common SEO misstakes
  • Generate titles, content, paragraphs and meta descriptions with Artificial Intelligence
  • Free SEO check function
  • Get 100 tokens to generate content
